## LinearCardContainer.getOrientation() method

Gets whether the given card is face up or down.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOrientation(index: number): CardOrientation;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Index of the card to get. |

**Returns:**

[CardOrientation](./bge-core.cardorientation.md)

Orientation of the given card.
